alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 7:13PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern and southern Yavapai County through 800 PM MST... At 710 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Yavapai County Fairgrounds to Dewey to Cordes Lakes to east of Cordes Junction. Movement was south at 5 to 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, up to half inch hail, and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dewey-Humboldt, Prescott Valley, Cordes Junction, Bumble Bee, Mayer, and Spring Valley. This includes the following highways... Interstate 17 between mile markers 250 and 270. State Route 89A between mile markers 329 and 330. State Route 69 between mile markers 263 and 288. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Heavy rainfall will create hazardous driving conditions due to reduced visibility and slick roads.

area.areaDesc: Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
